001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
006import java.util.function.Consumer;
007import java.util.function.Function;
008
009import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
010
011import com.commercetools.api.models.DomainResource;
012import com.commercetools.api.models.PagedQueryResourceRequest;
013import com.commercetools.api.models.ResourcePagedQueryResponse;
014
015public class QueryUtils {
016    static int DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE = 500;
017    /**
018     * <p>Queries all elements matching a query by using a limit based pagination with a combination of
019     * id sorting and a page size 500. More on the algorithm can be found here:
020     * <a href="https://docs.commercetools.com/api/general-concepts#iterating-over-all-elements">Iterating all elements</a>.</p>
021     *
022     * <p>The method takes a callback {@link java.util.function.Function} that returns a result of type {@code <S>} that
023     * is returned on every page of elements queried. Eventually, the method returns a {@link
024     * java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage} that contains a list of all the results of the callbacks returned from every
025     * page.
026     *
027     * <p>NOTE: This method fetches all paged results sequentially as opposed to fetching the pages in
028     * parallel.
029     *
030     * @param query query containing predicates and expansion paths
031     * @param pageMapper callback function that is called on every page queried
032     * @param <TElement> type of one query result element
033     * @param <TMethod> type of the query
034     * @param <S> type of the returned result of the callback function on every page.
035     * @return a completion stage containing a list of mapped pages as a result.
036     */
037    @Nonnull
038    public static <TMethod extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult>, TResult extends ResourcePagedQueryResponse<TElement>, TElement extends DomainResource<TElement>, S> CompletionStage<List<S>> queryAll(
039            @Nonnull final PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult> query,
040            @Nonnull final Function<List<TElement>, S> pageMapper) {
041        return queryAll(query, pageMapper, DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE);
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * <p>Queries all elements matching a query by using a limit based pagination with a combination of
046     * id sorting and a page size 500. More on the algorithm can be found here:
047     * <a href="https://docs.commercetools.com/api/general-concepts#iterating-over-all-elements">Iterating all elements</a>.</p>
048     *
049     * <p>The method takes a consumer {@link Consumer} that is applied on every page of elements
050     * queried.
051     *
052     * <p>NOTE: This method fetches all paged results sequentially as opposed to fetching the pages in
053     * parallel.
054     *
055     * @param query query containing predicates and expansion paths
056     * @param pageConsumer consumer applied on every page queried
057     * @param <TElement> type of one query result element
058     * @param <TMethod> type of the query
059     * @return a completion stage containing void as a result after the consumer was applied on all
060     *     pages.
061     */
062    @Nonnull
063    public static <TMethod extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult>, TResult extends ResourcePagedQueryResponse<TElement>, TElement extends DomainResource<TElement>> CompletionStage<Void> queryAll(
064            @Nonnull final PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult> query,
065            @Nonnull final Consumer<List<TElement>> pageConsumer) {
066        return queryAll(query, pageConsumer, DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE);
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * <p>Queries all elements matching a query by using a limit based pagination with a combination of
071     * id sorting and the supplied {@code pageSize}. More on the algorithm can be found here:
072     * <a href="https://docs.commercetools.com/api/general-concepts#iterating-over-all-elements">Iterating all elements</a>.</p>
073     *
074     * <p>The method takes a callback {@link Function} that returns a result of type {@code <S>} that
075     * is returned on every page of elements queried. Eventually, the method returns a {@link
076     * CompletionStage} that contains a list of all the results of the callbacks returned from every
077     * page.
078     *
079     * <p>NOTE: This method fetches all paged results sequentially as opposed to fetching the pages in
080     * parallel.
081     *
082     * @param query query containing predicates and expansion paths
083     * @param pageMapper callback function that is called on every page queried
084     * @param <TElement> type of one query result element
085     * @param <TMethod> type of the query
086     * @param <S> type of the returned result of the callback function on every page.
087     * @param pageSize the page size.
088     * @return a completion stage containing a list of mapped pages as a result.
089     */
090    @Nonnull
091    public static <TMethod extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult>, TResult extends ResourcePagedQueryResponse<TElement>, TElement extends DomainResource<TElement>, S> CompletionStage<List<S>> queryAll(
092            @Nonnull final PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult> query,
093            @Nonnull final Function<List<TElement>, S> pageMapper, final int pageSize) {
094        final QueryAll<TMethod, TResult, TElement, S> queryAll = QueryAll.of(query, pageSize);
095        return queryAll.run(pageMapper);
096    }
097
098    /**
099     * <p>Queries all elements matching a query by using a limit based pagination with a combination of
100     * id sorting and the supplied {@code pageSize}. More on the algorithm can be found here:
101     * <a href="https://docs.commercetools.com/api/general-concepts#iterating-over-all-elements">Iterating all elements</a>.</p>
102     *
103     * <p>The method takes a {@link java.util.function.Consumer} that is applied on every page of the queried elements.
104     *
105     * <p>NOTE: This method fetches all paged results sequentially as opposed to fetching the pages in
106     * parallel.
107     *
108     * @param query query containing predicates and expansion paths
109     * @param pageConsumer consumer applied on every page queried
110     * @param <TElement> type of one query result element
111     * @param <TMethod> type of the query
112     * @param pageSize the page size
113     * @return a completion stage containing void as a result after the consumer was applied on all
114     *     pages.
115     */
116    @Nonnull
117    public static <TMethod extends PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult>, TResult extends ResourcePagedQueryResponse<TElement>, TElement extends DomainResource<TElement>> CompletionStage<Void> queryAll(
118            @Nonnull final PagedQueryResourceRequest<TMethod, TResult> query,
119            @Nonnull final Consumer<List<TElement>> pageConsumer, final int pageSize) {
120        final QueryAll<TMethod, TResult, TElement, Void> queryAll = QueryAll.of(query, pageSize);
121        return queryAll.run(pageConsumer);
122    }
123}
